H0.text: Which American carnivorous mammal feeds by night, habitually dipping its prey into water before eating. Otter

H1.text: Which American carnivorous mammal feeds by night, habitually dipping its prey into water before eating. Mink

H2.text: Which American carnivorous mammal feeds by night, habitually dipping its prey into water before eating. Fisher

H3.text: Which American carnivorous mammal feeds by night, habitually dipping its prey into water before eating. Racoon

A5.text: An omnivore, it feeds on a wide variety of small animals and occasionally on fruits and mushrooms.

A6.text: Raccoons carry their food to water to wash or douse it before eating.
